title: No Lies for 24 Hours
description: Make it through one full day without a single lie — not even a small one.

en.title: No Lies for 24 Hours
en.description: Make it through one full day without a single lie — not even a small one.

fr.title: Pas de mensonges pendant 24 heures
fr.description: Passez une journée complète sans un seul mensonge — pas même un petit.

ar.title: لا كذب لمدة 24 ساعة
ar.description: اجتز يوماً كاملاً دون كذبة واحدة — ولا حتى صغيرة.

title: Truth Audit
description: Before sleeping, review your conversations. Were you fully honest? Reflect and write in your journal.

en.title: Truth Audit
en.description: Before sleeping, review your conversations. Were you fully honest? Reflect and write in your journal.

fr.title: Audit de vérité
fr.description: Avant de dormir, passez en revue vos conversations. Avez-vous été entièrement honnête? Réfléchissez et écrivez dans votre journal.

ar.title: مراجعة الصدق
ar.description: قبل النوم، راجع محادثاتك. هل كنت صادقاً تماماً؟ تأمل واكتب في يومياتك.

title: Correct a Past Lie
description: Reach out to someone and correct something dishonest you've said before. Seek Allah's forgiveness.

en.title: Correct a Past Lie
en.description: Reach out to someone and correct something dishonest you've said before. Seek Allah's forgiveness.

fr.title: Corrigez un mensonge passé
fr.description: Contactez quelqu'un et corrigez quelque chose de malhonnête que vous avez dit auparavant. Demandez le pardon d'Allah.

ar.title: صحح كذبة سابقة
ar.description: تواصل مع شخص وصحح شيئاً غير صادق قلته من قبل. اطلب مغفرة الله.

title: Leave the Room (Literally or Virtually)
description: If someone starts backbiting, remove yourself — respectfully. One-time challenge.

en.title: Leave the Room (Literally or Virtually)
en.description: If someone starts backbiting, remove yourself — respectfully. One-time challenge.

fr.title: Quittez la pièce (littéralement ou virtuellement)
fr.description: Si quelqu'un commence à médire, retirez-vous — respectueusement. Défi unique.

ar.title: اترك الغرفة (حرفياً أو افتراضياً)
ar.description: إذا بدأ أحد بالغيبة، اخرج من المكان — باحترام. تحدي لمرة واحدة.

title: Defend Their Honour
description: Say one good thing about someone being backbitten. Flip the tone of the conversation.

en.title: Defend Their Honour
en.description: Say one good thing about someone being backbitten. Flip the tone of the conversation.

fr.title: Défendez leur honneur
fr.description: Dites quelque chose de bien sur quelqu'un qui est médisant. Changez le ton de la conversation.

ar.title: ادافع عن شرفهم
ar.description: قل شيئاً جيداً عن شخص يُغتاب. اعكس نبرة المحادثة.

title: Fast From Gossip
description: For the next 3 hours, no gossip. No stories about anyone else. See how long you can last.

en.title: Fast From Gossip
en.description: For the next 3 hours, no gossip. No stories about anyone else. See how long you can last.

fr.title: Jeûne des commérages
fr.description: Pour les 3 prochaines heures, pas de ragots. Pas d'histoires sur qui que ce soit d'autre. Voyez combien de temps vous pouvez tenir.

ar.title: صيام من النميمة
ar.description: للثلاث ساعات القادمة، لا نميمة. لا قصص عن أي شخص آخر. انظر كم من الوقت يمكنك الصمود.

title: Pause Before You Speak
description: Any time you speak today, pause for 3 seconds before repeating something about someone else.

en.title: Pause Before You Speak
en.description: Any time you speak today, pause for 3 seconds before repeating something about someone else.

ar.title: توقف قبل أن تتكلم
ar.description: اليوم، توقف وفكر قبل أن تقول أي شيء قد يضر بسمعة شخص.

fr.title: Pause avant de parler
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, arrêtez-vous et réfléchissez avant de dire quoi que ce soit qui pourrait nuire à la réputation de quelqu'un.

title: Delete the Message
description: Delete a message or post that could misrepresent someone, even slightly. Don't spread doubt.

en.title: Delete the Message
en.description: Delete a message or post that could misrepresent someone, even slightly. Don't spread doubt.

ar.title: احذف الرسالة
ar.description: إذا كتبت رسالة غاضبة أو قاسية اليوم، احذفها بدلاً من إرسالها.

fr.title: Supprimez le message
fr.description: Si vous écrivez un message en colère ou dur aujourd'hui, supprimez-le au lieu de l'envoyer.

title: Say 'I Don't Know'
description: When unsure, say 'I don't know' today. Resist the urge to fill gaps with assumptions.

en.title: Say 'I Don't Know'
en.description: When unsure, say 'I don't know' today. Resist the urge to fill gaps with assumptions.

ar.title: قل 'لا أعرف'
ar.description: اليوم، إذا سئلت عن شيء لا تعرفه، قل 'لا أعرف' بدلاً من التخمين.

fr.title: Dites 'Je ne sais pas'
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, si on vous demande quelque chose que vous ne savez pas, dites 'Je ne sais pas' au lieu de deviner.

title: Be the Gentle One
description: Speak kindly today. Avoid all sarcasm, imitations, and subtle mocking.

en.title: Be the Gentle One
en.description: Speak kindly today. Avoid all sarcasm, imitations, and subtle mocking.

ar.title: كن الشخص اللطيف
ar.description: اليوم، كن الشخص الذي يهدئ الموقف بدلاً من السخرية.

fr.title: Soyez la personne douce
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, soyez la personne qui calme la situation au lieu de se moquer.

title: Silent Smile
description: Today, when tempted to joke at someone's expense — smile instead. Let it pass.

en.title: Silent Smile
en.description: Today, when tempted to joke at someone's expense — smile instead. Let it pass.

ar.title: ابتسامة صامتة
ar.description: اليوم، رد على الإهانة بابتسامة صامتة وادع للشخص في قلبك.

fr.title: Sourire silencieux
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, répondez à l'insulte par un sourire silencieux et priez pour la personne dans votre cœur.

title: Compliment the One You Mock
description: Think of someone you've mocked. Privately make dua for them. Optionally, offer praise to their face.

en.title: Compliment the One You Mock
en.description: Think of someone you've mocked. Privately make dua for them. Optionally, offer praise to their face.

ar.title: امدح من تسخر منه
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، امدح شخصاً بدلاً من السخرية منه.

fr.title: Complimentez celui dont vous vous moquez
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, complimentez quelqu'un au lieu de vous moquer de lui.

title: Three Sacred Silences
description: For today, find 3 moments to consciously be silent when you would normally speak unnecessarily.

en.title: Three Sacred Silences
en.description: For today, find 3 moments to consciously be silent when you would normally speak unnecessarily.

ar.title: ثلاثة صمت مقدسة
ar.description: اليوم، التزم الصمت في ثلاث مناسبات حيث كنت ستتكلم بلا فائدة.

fr.title: Trois silences sacrés
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, gardez le silence dans trois occasions où vous auriez parlé sans utilité.

title: Intentional Speech Week
description: For 7 days, try to speak only when you have clear purpose or benefit. Reflect at day's end.

en.title: Intentional Speech Week
en.description: For 7 days, try to speak only when you have clear purpose or benefit. Reflect at day's end.

ar.title: أسبوع الكلام المقصود
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تكلم فقط عندما يكون لكلامك فائدة واضحة.

fr.title: Semaine de parole intentionnelle
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, parlez seulement quand vos paroles ont un bénéfice clair.

title: Silent Mornings
description: For the next 3 days, remain silent after Fajr until breakfast unless necessary.

en.title: Silent Mornings
en.description: For the next 3 days, remain silent after Fajr until breakfast unless necessary.

ar.title: صباح صامت
ar.description: اليوم، ابدأ صباحك بساعة من الصمت والتأمل.

fr.title: Matins silencieux
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, commencez votre matinée par une heure de silence et de réflexion.

title: Truthful Compliments Only
description: Today, only give compliments you mean. No flattery. No exaggeration.

en.title: Truthful Compliments Only
en.description: Today, only give compliments you mean. No flattery. No exaggeration.

ar.title: مجاملات صادقة فقط
ar.description: اليوم، قل فقط المجاملات الصادقة والصحيحة.

fr.title: Compliments véridiques seulement
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, ne dites que des compliments sincères et vrais.

title: Authenticity Practice – 7 Days
description: Avoid insincere compliments or strategic praise for 7 days. Honour truth in every word.

en.title: Authenticity Practice – 7 Days
en.description: Avoid insincere compliments or strategic praise for 7 days. Honour truth in every word.

ar.title: ممارسة الأصالة - 7 أيام
ar.description: لمدة 7 أيام، كن صادقاً في مدحك وتجنب المجاملات المفرطة.

fr.title: Pratique d'authenticité - 7 jours
fr.description: Pendant 7 jours, soyez sincère dans vos éloges et évitez les flatteries excessives.

title: 14-Day Praise Cleanse
description: For 14 days, be mindful of any praise you offer. Let it be genuine and spiritually safe.

en.title: 14-Day Praise Cleanse
en.description: For 14 days, be mindful of any praise you offer. Let it be genuine and spiritually safe.

ar.title: تطهير المدح لمدة 14 يوماً
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، طهر مدحك من المجاملات الفارغة.

fr.title: Nettoyage d'éloge de 14 jours
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, purifiez vos éloges des compliments vides.

title: Zip the Lips
description: Do not reveal anything personal you know about others for 24 hours. Not even hints.

en.title: Zip the Lips
en.description: Do not reveal anything personal you know about others for 24 hours. Not even hints.

ar.title: اقفل شفتيك
ar.description: اليوم، التزم الصمت عندما تشعر بالرغبة في قول شيء سلبي.

fr.title: Fermez les lèvres
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, restez silencieux quand vous ressentez l'envie de dire quelque chose de négatif.

title: Safeguard the Trust
description: For 7 days, reflect on whether you speak from trust. Record slips and ask Allah for restraint.

en.title: Safeguard the Trust
en.description: For 7 days, reflect on whether you speak from trust. Record slips and ask Allah for restraint.

ar.title: احفظ الأمانة
ar.description: اليوم، احفظ كل أمانة وسر أوكل إليك.

fr.title: Protégez la confiance
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, protégez chaque confiance et secret qui vous est confié.

title: Honour the Private
description: If you've recently shared something private, contact that person to affirm your trust.

en.title: Honour the Private
en.description: If you've recently shared something private, contact that person to affirm your trust.

ar.title: أكرم الخاص
ar.description: اليوم، احترم خصوصية الآخرين ولا تفشِ أسرارهم.

fr.title: Honorez le privé
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, respectez la vie privée des autres et ne révélez pas leurs secrets.

title: Refined Language Day
description: No swearing, rough words, or aggressive tone for 24 hours. Use words of mercy and dignity.

en.title: Refined Language Day
en.description: No swearing, rough words, or aggressive tone for 24 hours. Use words of mercy and dignity.

ar.title: يوم اللغة المهذبة
ar.description: اليوم، استخدم لغة مهذبة ونظيفة في كل محادثاتك.

fr.title: Jour de langage raffiné
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, utilisez un langage raffiné et propre dans toutes vos conversations.

title: Speak Like a Believer – 7 Days
description: For a full week, monitor your speech tone and purity. Use reminders and daily du'a for control.

en.title: Speak Like a Believer – 7 Days
en.description: For a full week, monitor your speech tone and purity. Use reminders and daily du'a for control.

ar.title: تكلم كالمؤمن - 7 أيام
ar.description: لمدة 7 أيام، اجعل كلامك يليق بالمؤمن.

fr.title: Parlez comme un croyant - 7 jours
fr.description: Pendant 7 jours, faites que votre discours convienne à un croyant.

title: 14-Day Clean Speech Reset
description: Avoid all profanity, innuendo, or hostile tone for 14 days. Let your words carry the fragrance of mercy.

en.title: 14-Day Clean Speech Reset
en.description: Avoid all profanity, innuendo, or hostile tone for 14 days. Let your words carry the fragrance of mercy.

ar.title: إعادة تعيين الكلام النظيف لمدة 14 يوماً
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، اعيد تعيين لغتك إلى الكلام النظيف والطاهر.

fr.title: Réinitialisation du discours propre de 14 jours
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, réinitialisez votre langage vers un discours propre et pur.

title: Let It Go (Once)
description: Walk away from one argument today — even if you're right. Choose peace over ego.

en.title: Let It Go (Once)
en.description: Walk away from one argument today — even if you're right. Choose peace over ego.

ar.title: اتركها (مرة واحدة)
ar.description: اليوم، اترك شيئاً واحداً كان يؤذيك واعف عنه.

fr.title: Laissez tomber (une fois)
fr.description: Aujourd'hui, laissez tomber une chose qui vous blessait et pardonnez-la.

title: 7 Days of Calm Speech
description: Refrain from raising your voice or arguing for 7 days. Choose stillness over combativeness.

en.title: 7 Days of Calm Speech
en.description: Refrain from raising your voice or arguing for 7 days. Choose stillness over combativeness.

ar.title: 7 أيام من الكلام الهادئ
ar.description: لمدة أسبوع، تكلم بهدوء وتجنب الجدال.

fr.title: 7 jours de parole calme
fr.description: Pendant une semaine, parlez calmement et évitez les disputes.

title: 14-Day Dispute Detox
description: Avoid all disputes — verbal, online, or passive-aggressive — for 14 days. Replace with du'a.

en.title: 14-Day Dispute Detox
en.description: Avoid all disputes — verbal, online, or passive-aggressive — for 14 days. Replace with du'a.

ar.title: تخلص من الجدال لمدة 14 يوماً
ar.description: لمدة أسبوعين، تجنب الجدال والمناقشات العقيمة.

fr.title: Détox de dispute de 14 jours
fr.description: Pendant deux semaines, évitez les disputes et les discussions stériles.
